Welcome to Jubler's documentation!
==================================

Welcom to the complete beginner's guide to Jubler! If you're looking for a comprehensive guide to the Jubler subtitling software, then you've come to the right place.

If you're completely new to Jubler, :ref:`install Jubler first <settingup>` and then explore these pages:

   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:
   
   beforeyoubegin

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Beginners
   
   creating
